How do I use the `keypoolrefill` command to shrink the keypool to 50?

The `keypoolrefill` command is used to fill the keypool, not shrink it. If you want to set the keypool size to 50, you would use `keypoolrefill 50`. The default size is 100, but you can specify a different size as an argument.

keypoolrefill ( newsize )

Fills the keypool.

Arguments
1. newsize   (numeric, optional, default=100) The new keypool size

Examples:
> verus keypoolrefill 
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "keypoolrefill", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
